name: Federal obligations for research and experimental development and for R&D plant, by state or location: FY 2021
description: Federal obligations for research and experimental development and for R&D plant, by state or location: FY 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Because of rounding, detail may not add to total. Geographic distribution of DOD development funding to businesses reflects location of prime contractors and not the numerous subcontractors who perform much of the R&D. FY 2021 obligations include additional funding provided by supplemental COVID-19 pandemic-related appropriations (e.g., Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security [CARES] Act).
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Federal Funds for Research and Development, FYs 2021–22.
